alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 7:45PM CST until February 07 at 12:20AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Agricultural land along the river is flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 25.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Thursday was 25.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 25.1 Thu 7 pm CST 25.6 26.5 26.7 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 800 AM CST.
